8. your non-instantaneous spells gain a 4+ recharge; 3pts distributed

startingMods.description: +1d4 nec dmg to your melee wep hits
you ignore the effects of sunlight on you
startingMods.upgrade: +2 dmg taken in sunlight and 3pts distributed/1

startingMods.description: +1 passive regen while not in sunlight

thematicMods.description: 2. on death while not in sunlight, you instead transform into a cloud of mist and disperse into the atmosphere for 1 week, before healing to 1 HP and reforming in a location you consider safe on the same landmass (usually your home)

3. on death while not in running water, you instead transform into a cloud of mist and disperse into the atmosphere for 1 week, before healing to 1 HP and reforming in a location you consider safe on the same landmass (usually your home)
4. +1 passive regen while not in running water
5. +1 passive regen if you haven't taken rad dmg since your last turn
7. you cannot enter residences without an invitation from an occupant; 4pts distributed
thematicMods.upgrade: -1 decep while within a city's borders and 2pts distributed/1

thematicMods.description: 8. on ending your turn in running water, take 5 acid dmg; 2pts distributed
9. when crit by P dmg, you are staggered until your next turn; 3pts distributed
10. on starting your turn in sunlight, take 3 rad dmg; 2pts distributed

startingMods.description: on init, recover 2 spell slot lvls
if you haven't atk'd or cast a spell since start of your last turn, +2 passive regen while bloodied
if you haven't atk'd or cast a spell since start of your last turn, you are invis and can move thru foe spaces until you either do so or take boss dmg
startingMods.upgrade: no boss dmg reversion --> no atk/cast reversion/1->2

thematicMods.description: 2. on spell hit, +5' sp until end of your turn
3. recover 1 spell slot lvl on becoming invis
4. before you cast a spell while invis, you can move up to 5' toward the spell's target
6. while invis, your spell hits splash 2 dmg
7. on hit vs target debuffed by you, one of the debuffs of your choice is removed; 3pts distributed
thematicMods.upgrade: -2->1 spell dmg vs targets debuffed by you and 2pts distributed/1

thematicMods.description: 8. on hit vs target debuffed by you, they are slowed until end of their next turn
thematicMods.upgrade: +1 spell AB vs targets debuffed by you/3

thematicMods.description: 9. when one of your debuffs ends on a creature, recover 1 spell slot lvl
10. when one of your debuffs that has been active for at least 1 rnd ends on a creature, that creature is charmed by you until the end of their next turn
